command.text: &Key; declare @message nvarchar(4000), @userName nvarchar(32) select @userName = rtrim(comment) from userinfo2 where id = @@userID select @message = 'this._userName = ''' + replace(replace(isnull(rtrim(@userName), ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''';this._key = ''' + @rk + ''';loadForm(this);' select @message as message return

script.text: function loadForm(a){var b=a.grid;a.add_onResponseComplete(on$Form$ResponseComplete);a._$init&&a.request("Key","Key",[]);a._$init=true}function closeForm(a){try{a.remove_onResponseComplete(on$Form$ResponseComplete)}catch(b){}}function on$Form$ResponseComplete(e,b){var a=b.object,d=b.type.Context,c=b.type.Result;switch(d){case"Key":a._key=c[0].Value;break;case"CheckKey":if(c[0].Value)request$EIResendEmail(a);else $message.show(a._language=="v"?"Mật khẩu xác nhận không đúng.":"Confirmation password is invalid.",String.format("revertPassword('{0}', '', true); $find('{0}').focus('{1}');",a.get_id(),"cpass"))}}function genHash(b){var a=b.parentForm,c=$func.trim(MD5(b.value));a.getItem("chkpass").value=CRC32($func.trim(a._key).substr(0,8)+c.substr(1,c.length-2))}function checkFieldEntry(a,b,c){if(c)b=a.getItem(b);var d=c?b.value:b.oldValue;if(a._checked&&!d){a._checked=false;$func.hideWait(a.get_id());$message.show(String.format($df.getResources(a._language,"Message.RequiredField"),b.field.Label),String.format("revertPassword('{0}', '', true); $find('{0}').focus('{1}');",a.get_id(),b.field.Name))}}function revertPassword(a,d,c){if(c)a=$find(a);var b=a.getItem("cpass");if(b.oldValue)b.value=b.oldValue}function request$EIResendEmail(a){var c=a.grid,b=a.getItemValue("e_mail");request$EIProcess(c,false,b);a.cancelDialog()} &CheckValidEmailFunction;
